title: Tesla offers rare year-end discounts on 2 top-selling models
description: Tesla is offering rare discounts through year’s end on its two top-selling models, an indication that demand is slowing for its electric vehicles

title: Explosion ignites fire in Moroccan propane gas storage plant
description: An explosion hit a propane gas storage unit on the Moroccan coast, sending balls of flames into the sky

title: Florida high court OKs grand jury probe of COVID-19 vaccines
description: The Florida Supreme Court will convene a grand jury at Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis' request to investigate any wrongdoing with respect to the COVID-19 vaccines

title: 'All eyes are on El Paso,' the latest epicenter of migrant surge
description: El Paso, Texas, is at the center of a spike in asylum-seekers and other migrants as the Supreme Court decides the fate of the Title 42 immigration policy

title: NY attorney general looking at controversy over congressman-elect's background
description: New York Rep.-elect George Santos on Thursday said he plans to address a mounting controversy over discrepancies in his biography

title: Mass shooting survivor offers $10,000 reward in search for kidnapped twin baby
description: A survivor of a 2019 mass shooting is offering a $10,000 reward in the search for an Ohio baby taken in a car theft.

title: 6 takeaways from the Tory Lanez trial and the alleged shooting of Megan Thee Stallion
description: Closing arguments began on Wednesday in the trial of rapper Tory Lanez, who is charged with allegedly shooting Megan Thee Stallion. Here are six key takeaways.

title: DC police officers found guilty in fatal pursuit of man on electric scooter
description: Two Washington, D.C., police officers have been found guilty in the 2020 death of Karon Hylton-Brown during a vehicle chase.

title: FIFA reviews chef's 'undue access' to hold World Cup trophy
description: FIFA says it's taking “appropriate internal action” to address breaches of World Cup protocol by a celebrity chef who held the gold trophy on the field

title: WATCH:  There is nothing cuter than these 3 rescue dogs sound asleep in their elf costumes
description: Anna Schwab caught her three rescue dogs, known as "The Rescue Boys," asleep in between scenes while filming an "Elf on the Shelf" video.

title: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried released on $250 million bond
description: A federal magistrate on Thursday ordered disgraced FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried released on a $250 million personal recognizance bond signed by his parents.

title: Senate passes $1.7T spending bill, getting one step closer to averting a shutdown
description: The Senate reached a deal Thursday on the omnibus bill after negotiations hit a snag over Title 42 drama.

title: US teacher speaks out after release from Russia the same day as Brittney Griner
description: Sarah Krivanek was released Dec. 8, the same day that WNBA star Brittney Griner was released from Russian captivity.

title: White House: Russia's Wagner received arms from North Korea
description: The White House says that a private Russian military company has taken delivery of an arms shipment from North Korea to help bolster its forces as it fights side-by-side with Russian troops in Ukraine

title: Biden to deliver 'Christmas address' on 'what unites us as Americans'
description: President Joe Biden will deliver an address Thursday "on what unites us as Americans, his optimism for the year ahead, and wishing Americans joy in the coming year."

title: Governor grants clemency to 13 people in name of 'justice and fairness'
description: Governor Kathy Hochul grants clemency to 13 incarcerated individuals, including a domestic abuse survivor.

title: Homeless people ask court to stop San Francisco tent sweeps
description: Homeless people are asking a federal judge for an emergency order to stop San Francisco from dismantling tent encampments without offering shelter beds

title: West Point moves to vanquish Confederate symbols from campus
description: The U.S. Military Academy in West Point will begin taking down memorials commemorating figures of the Confederacy

title: WATCH:  Otters use snow-covered jetty as personal slide
description: A snow-covered jetty proved the perfect slide for a group of otters in Seattle.

title: Former Kansas lawmaker convicted of COVID-19 relief fraud
description: A federal jury has found a former Kansas state lawmaker guilty of 12 felonies for lying on applications for federal COVID-19 relief

title: American foster parents charged in Uganda with torturing 10-year-old
description: An American couple in Uganda has been charged with aggregated torture for their alleged treatment of a 10-year-old child they were fostering, according to police.

title: Zelenskyy's emotional call for American resolve: ANALYSIS
description: The symbolism was unmistakable -- the American vice president and House speaker holding up before both chambers of Congress a Ukrainian flag.

title: Russia’s sole aircraft carrier catches fire
description: Russian state media say a fire broke out onboard Russia’s sole aircraft carrier, in the latest of a string of incidents incidents marring the Admiral Kuznetsov’s ongoing refit

title: US economy grew 3.2% in Q3, an upgrade from earlier estimate
description: Shrugging off rampant inflation and rising interest rates, the U.S. economy grew at an unexpectedly strong 3.2% annual pace from July through September, the government reported Thursday in a slight upgrade from its earlier estimate of third-quarter growth

title: US life expectancy drops to lowest in 26 years due to COVID, drug overdoses
description: Two new CDC studies published Thursday found life expectancy fell to 76.4 years in 2021, the lowest recorded since 1996 -- mostly due to COVID and drug overdose deaths.

title: 6 months after overturning of Roe v. Wade, what abortion access looks like in America
description: Where and how people can access abortion care has changed dramatically across the country six months after Roe v Wade was overturned.

title: An animal tranquilizer is showing up in the nation's illicit drug supply
description: Xylazine is often found in combination with fentanyl and other opioids.

title: Brittney Griner pens thank you letter, urges supporters to write to Paul Whelan
description: Brittney Griner on Wednesday posted an open letter thanking fans for their support and urging them to write to Paul Whalen, an American detained in Russia.

title: China's official COVID stats mask unprecedented surge overwhelming hospitals
description: China is facing its largest outbreak of the pandemic since the relaxation of its "zero-Covid" restrictions earlier this month after nationwide protests.

title: Does Elon Musk's resignation from Twitter mean he'll give up control?
description: Twitter owner Elon Musk's vow to step down amounts to "window dressing," one expert said.

title: Audit finds Tokyo Olympic costs 20% higher than announced
description: The cost of the delayed 2020 Tokyo Olympics is 20% higher than organizers said when they announced official cost figures more than a year ago

title: Final tally: Nearly 107,000 US overdose deaths last year
description: Nearly 107,000 Americans died of drug overdoses last year

title: Australian vandals destroy 30,000-year-old rock art
description: Australian authorities say vandals have destroyed rock art believed to be some 30,000 years old

title: WATCH:  Santa uses sign language to communicate with deaf and hard of hearing children
description: Santa used sign language to spread Christmas cheer to these deaf and hard of hearing children.

title: WATCH:  Zelenskyy presents battle-scarred Ukrainian flag to Congress
description: President Zelenskyy presented lawmakers with a battle-scarred Ukrainian flag from front-line soldiers as he addressed Congress. Nancy Pelosi then presented Zelenskyy with a framed American flag.

title: Grant Wahl's life celebrated at New York City gathering
description: Grant Wahl was remembered for his peripatetic life as a sportswriter, pursuit of social justice and lasting impact on family, friends and people he mentored

title: Netflix plans $900M facility at former New Jersey Army base
description: Netflix says it plans to build a state-of-the-art production facility at a former Army base at the Jersey Shore that will cost more than $900 million, and create thousands of jobs

title: Baltimore police investigate dozens of rideshare carjackings
description: Baltimore police are investigating dozens of rideshare carjackings and robberies over the past month

title: California quake occurred in very seismically active region
description: The big earthquake that rocked the far north coast of California this week originated in an area under the Pacific Ocean where multiple tectonic plates collide, creating the state's most seismically active region

title: Black Army veteran sues Colorado Springs police officers over alleged beating
description: Dalvin Gadson, a Black man allegedly beaten by Colorado Springs police during an October traffic stop, filed a federal civil rights lawsuit against the three officers.

title: 'Dehumanizing': Actress' arrest highlights abuse, torture in Iranian prisons
description: Families of Iranian protesters in jail say their loved ones are being tortured.

title: American woman released from Russian captivity speaks to ABC News
description: An American woman held in Russia for over a year is speaking about her ordeal after her release on Dec. 8, the same day as WNBA star Brittney Griner.
